mapper.select: SELECT cal_date, att_on, att_off, att_status FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(employee cal_date) */ rownum rn, to_char(cal_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') cal_date, to_char(att_on, 'HH24:MI:SS') att_on, to_char(att_off, 'HH24:MI:SS') att_off, att_status FROM attendance WHERE rownum <= 30 AND emp_no = #{emp_no} ) WHERE rn > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance(emp_no, cal_date, att_on, att_status) VALUES(#{emp_no}, to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')), sysdate, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT emp_no FROM attendance WHERE emp_no = #{emp_no} AND cal_date = to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) )
